languages.text: {n}Челюсть инквизитора тяжелеет.{/n} "Вопреки сложившемуся образу, я — не воспитатель для шаловливых Вольных Торговцев. Каллигос отверг призыв исполнить свой долг перед Императором, и я не вижу, о чем в такой ситуации можно "договариваться".

{n}The Inquisitor's jaw hardens.{/n} "Despite the impression I may have created, I am not a schoolmaster obliged to rein in misbehaving Rogue Traders. Calligos rejected the call to fulfil his duty to the Emperor. What discussion was there to be had?"
languages.original_text: {n}Челюсть инквизитора тяжелеет.{/n} "Вопреки сложившемуся образу, я — не воспитатель для шаловливых Вольных Торговцев. Каллигос отверг призыв исполнить свой долг перед Императором, и я не вижу, о чем в такой ситуации можно "договариваться".

traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}大审判官抿紧了嘴唇。{/n}“虽然我看起来可能像位和善的校长，似乎有义务管教那些行为不端的行商浪人，但这并不是我的职责。卡里戈斯拒绝向帝皇履行他的职责，这还有什么好谈的？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's jaw hardens.{/n} "Despite the impression I may have created, I am not a schoolmaster obliged to rein in misbehaving Rogue Traders. Calligos rejected the call to fulfil his duty to the Emperor. What discussion was there to be had?"

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长抿紧了嘴唇。{/n}“虽然我看起来可能像位和善的校长，似乎有义务管教那些行为不端的行商浪人，但这并不是我的职责。卡里戈斯拒绝向帝皇履行他的职责，这还有什么好谈的？”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}El Inquisidor endurece el gesto.{/n} «A pesar de la impresión que pueda haberle causado, no soy el director de un colegio, obligado a meter en vereda a los Comerciantes Independientes díscolos. Calligos ha rechazado la llamada de cumplir su deber hacia el Emperador. ¿De qué más se supone que debo hablar con él?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's jaw hardens.{/n} "Despite the impression I may have created, I am not a schoolmaster obliged to rein in misbehaving Rogue Traders. Calligos rejected the call to fulfil his duty to the Emperor. What discussion was there to be had?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Inquisidor endurece el gesto.{/n} «A pesar de la impresión que pueda haberle causado, no soy el director de un colegio, obligado a meter en vereda a los Comerciantes Independientes díscolos. Calligos ha rechazado la llamada de cumplir su deber hacia el Emperador. ¿De qué más se supone que debo hablar con él?».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}異端審問官の口元がこわばる。{/n}「どんな印象を持ったのかは知らないが、私は問題のある自由開拓者を止める義務を持つ学校長ではない。カリゴスは皇帝への義務を果たせという要請を拒否した。何を話すべきだったというのだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's jaw hardens.{/n} "Despite the impression I may have created, I am not a schoolmaster obliged to rein in misbehaving Rogue Traders. Calligos rejected the call to fulfil his duty to the Emperor. What discussion was there to be had?"

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問官の口元がこわばる。{/n}「どんな印象を持ったのかは知らないが、私は問題のある自由開拓者を止める義務を持つ学校長ではない。カリゴスは皇帝への義務を果たせという要請を拒否した。何を話すべきだったというのだ？」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Le seigneur inquisiteur serre les dents.{/n} « Même si j'ai pu en donner l'impression, je ne suis pas un maître d'école obligé de contrôler ses libres-marchands turbulents. Lorsque Calligos a été appelé à accomplir son devoir envers l'Empereur, il a fait la sourde oreille. Quelle discussion aurions-nous pu avoir ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's jaw hardens.{/n} "Despite the impression I may have created, I am not a schoolmaster obliged to rein in misbehaving Rogue Traders. Calligos rejected the call to fulfil his duty to the Emperor. What discussion was there to be had?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le seigneur inquisiteur serre les dents.{/n} « Même si j'ai pu en donner l'impression, je ne suis pas un maître d'école obligé de contrôler ses libres-marchands turbulents. Lorsque Calligos a été appelé à accomplir son devoir envers l'Empereur, il a fait la sourde oreille. Quelle discussion aurions-nous pu avoir ? »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Der Inquisitor schiebt den Unterkiefer nach vorne.{/n} "Trotz des Eindrucks, den ich vielleicht erweckt habe, bin ich kein Schulmeister, der Freihändler mit schlechtem Benehmen auf Kurs bringt. Calligos hat den Ruf missachtet, seine Pflicht für den Imperator zu erfüllen. Was gibt es da noch zu reden?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's jaw hardens.{/n} "Despite the impression I may have created, I am not a schoolmaster obliged to rein in misbehaving Rogue Traders. Calligos rejected the call to fulfil his duty to the Emperor. What discussion was there to be had?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Inquisitor schiebt den Unterkiefer nach vorne.{/n} "Trotz des Eindrucks, den ich vielleicht erweckt habe, bin ich kein Schulmeister, der Freihändler mit schlechtem Benehmen auf Kurs bringt. Calligos hat den Ruf missachtet, seine Pflicht für den Imperator zu erfüllen. Was gibt es da noch zu reden?"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Engizisyoncu'nun çenesi kaskatı kesiliyor.{/n} "Belki sende bıraktığım izlenim yanıltıcı olmuştur. Yaramaz Hür Tacirlerin bakıcısı değilim ben. Calligos, İmparator'un ona verdiği vazifeyi reddetmiştir. Daha tartışacak ne var?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's jaw hardens.{/n} "Despite the impression I may have created, I am not a schoolmaster obliged to rein in misbehaving Rogue Traders. Calligos rejected the call to fulfil his duty to the Emperor. What discussion was there to be had?"
